scripts.start: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd backend && npm install && npm run prod)
scripts.startWin: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd ../backend && npm install && npm run prod)
scripts.build: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd backend && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.buildWin: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd ../backend && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.frontend-dev: cd ./frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.backend-dev: cd ./backend && npm install && npm run dev
